```{r}
#| fig-cap: "this is my caption"

crab_data <- pie_crab %>%
  group_by(site) %>% 
  summarise(mean = round(mean(size, na.rm = TRUE), 2), 
            std = round(sd(size, na.rm = TRUE), 2),
            ss = n())

crab_data <- crab_data %>% 
  rename("avg_carapace_width(mm)" = mean,
         "Standard Deviation" = std,
         "Sample Size" = ss)

ggplot(data = pie_crab, aes(x = latitude, y = size)) +
  geom_point()

crab_data
```
